item.title: Tomato & Fennel Bread Recipe
item.description: Consistent results when making bread is tricky. Things like measurements, room temperature and kneading time can all impact on the success of a loaf. Using a bread machine goes along way to ensuring at least the temperature and kneading are largely consistent and take the guesswork out of these aspects. That leaves you with just needing to be precise with your ingredients to guarantee dependable results.
